recent.title: Skinali Landing Page
recent.descrip: Skinali Factory Landing page using HTML/CSS, Sass, jQuery from a PSD template. Fully responsive, contains animations and has a before/after slider combined with a slick carousel.

recent.title: ToDoster ionic/Angular App
recent.descrip: CRUD To-do cross-platform app using Ionic Framework/Angular with a Firebase Authentication and a side-menu navigation. Ready to be used on Android and iOS.

recent.title: Yoga Tours Landing Page
recent.descrip: Yoga Tours Landing Page using HTML/CSS, Less and JavaScript. Contains tabs, slider carousel, timer, modals made with JavaScript from scratch. Project is bundled using Webpack and Babel.

recent.title: ActiveBox Landing Page
recent.descrip: ActiveBox Landing page using HTML/CSS, Sass, jQuery from a PSD template. Fully responsive, contains animations and a reviews carousel.

personal.title: PokeDex ionic/Angular App
personal.descrip: Ionic 4/Angular App using PokéAPI the RESTful Pokémon API with a side-menu navigation, infinite-scroll and swipe-refresh. You can search for pokemons and see details about them.

personal.title: Java Script Slider
personal.descrip: Very simple and easy to add JavaScript Slider with arrows and pagination dots navigation.

personal.title: MovieApp ionic/Angular App
personal.descrip: Ionic 4/Angular Movie App with an OMDb API implemented and a side-menu navigation. You can search for movies and see their details (plot, rating, actors, genre).

personal.title: CV/Resume
personal.descrip: CV/Resume web page made with CSS and HTML.

fun.title: Rock Paper Scissors
fun.descrip: Rock Paper Scissors game using HTML/CSS and JavaScript. User makes his selection and the computer responds with a random selection in a modal window.

fun.title: Dad Jokes Generator
fun.descrip: Dad Jokes Generator using JavaScript and icanhaz API.
